SELECT g.goods_no goodsNo , g.goods_title goodsTitle , g.goods_memo goodsMemo , g.goods_price goodsPrice , g.goods_state goodsState , g.update_date goodsUpdateDate , g.create_date goodsCreateDate , a.category_title categoryTitle , f.goods_file_no goodsFileNo , f.goods_file_name goodsFileName , f.goods_file_origin goodsFileOrigin , f.goods_file_ext goodsFileExt , f.goods_file_type goodsFileType , f.goods_file_size goodsFileSize , f.update_date goodsFileUpdateDate , f.create_date goodsFileCreateDate FROM goods g LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT g.goods_no , category_title FROM goods_category g LEFT OUTER JOIN category c ON g.category_no = c.category_no) a ON g.goods_no = a.goods_no LEFT OUTER JOIN goods_file f ON g.goods_no = f.goods_no
WHERE g.goods_no = #{goodsNo}

SELECT g.goods_no goodsNo , g.goods_title goodsTitle , g.goods_memo goodsMemo , g.goods_price goodsPrice , g.goods_state goodsState , g.update_date updateDate , g.create_date createDate , f.goods_file_name goodsFileName , f.goods_file_ext goodsFileExt FROM goods g LEFT OUTER JOIN goods_file f ON g.goods_no = f.goods_no ORDER BY goodsNo DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage};
